cards.name: Bounce
cards.text: Redirect an attack aimed at you

cards.name: Phylactery Swap
cards.text: Swap the held phylacteries of two players

cards.name: Mana Charge
cards.text: Gain 3 mana. Lose 2 at the beginning of your next turn.

cards.name: Phylactery Mulligan
cards.text: Choose a phylactery from the deck and replace a held phylactery with it (the replaced card is shuffled into the deck). Only cast during your turn.

cards.name: Life Swap
cards.text: Swap life totals with another player
